title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 60-1.1 - Title and citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 60-1.1 - Title and citation

State Regulations

Within and for the purpose of the Department of Labor, this Part may be known as Industrial Code No. 60. This Part relates to the

Safety Incentive Program, the Drug and Alcohol Prevention Program and the

Return to Work Program (collectively referred to as the "Workplace Safety and

Loss Prevention Incentive Program," or "WSLPIP"). It may be cited as Industrial

Code Rule 60, the Workplace Safety and Loss Prevention Incentive Program, or
WSLPIP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
60-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
